Floulib Documentation¶

The library floulib is a library for fuzzy logic. It was designed to implement exercices proposed in the second edition of the book in French “Logique floue : exercices corrigés” by Bernadette Bouchon-Meunier, Laurent Foulloy, Mohammed Ramdani, Cépadues-Editions.
